Our technology gives you mobile trading power like never before, including interactive charts, event notifications, along with a wide range of features: â¢	Touch to trade stock, options and complex options, ETFs, futures, and forex*â¢	Scan multi-touch charts with hundreds of chart studies, including your unique user created studiesâ¢	Stream live CNBC, International CNBC, and tastytrade (CNBC channels require 4.0 or newer)â¢	Access and track events through an interactive market calendarâ¢	Create and modify complex orders quickly and easily â¢	Live streaming newsâ¢	Real-time quotes**â¢	Track and modify orders and alertsâ¢	Manage positions and view your account balances on all your linked accountsâ¢	View risk and performance metrics â¢	Share ideas and connect with other traders via myTradeÂ® community***â¢	Streaming audio with SwimLessonsSMâ¢	Scroll through full-screen views of your custom watch lists and scans, positions, orders, news, charts, and moreâ¢	Test strategies with paperMoneyÂ®Market volatility, volume, and system availability may delay account access and trade executions.* Options are not suitable for all investors. reviews.title: Paper Money for Android
reviews.comment: Works pretty well for a mobile platform. Not that many stock simulators out there that allow this many options strategies. The limit price changed very easily when making trades, so double check your price before submitting the order.
reviews.author: Robert II

reviews.title: Excellent app for real time quotes and charts
reviews.comment: I really like the customizable charts and real-time data to follow the markets. The app is very usable, but needs improvement in navigability.
reviews.author: Karthik Balakrishnan

reviews.title: Good and getting better
reviews.comment: Every update has a little more functionality.  When I\'m not near my computer I am comfortable with checking my trades on my phone.
reviews.author: Duane Williams

reviews.comment: Much better than the previous version. Still can add volume by price on charts, but the rest of the product is very functional.
reviews.author: J Murph

reviews.title: More data
reviews.comment: It would be better if more data could be available,like prob of ITM and OTM.
reviews.author: David Lopez

reviews.title: Packed with features
reviews.comment: Allows for virtually full functionality.
reviews.author: Phoebe Lutz

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Andrew Hanson

reviews.title: Good functionality.
reviews.comment: Need ability to have more than one indicator and sort by symbol or % change etc.
reviews.author: larry austin

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Overall the app runs well. The same indicators & overlays are available here that are on the desktop platform. The data is delayed, so that is a minus for me, the app is responsive & easy to use & trade off of. Overall I recommend it.
reviews.author: George Norman

reviews.comment: Needs more tabs, ability to have multiple studies on one timeframe
reviews.author: D Mischel

reviews.title: A+
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Literally use it every day.
reviews.author: Brett Mathers

reviews.title: improved
reviews.comment: ..for now, seems to work ok.   can we get a setting to turn the sound off?
reviews.author: Robert Pickle

reviews.title: Awesome on the go!
reviews.comment: Awesome on the go!
reviews.author: James Tuggle

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Keeps me posted livetime
reviews.author: charlie vo

reviews.title: Works ok
reviews.comment: Does what it needs to do after I figured out all settings to make a trade.
reviews.author: David Butler

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Needs more improvements, be able to have more then 1 study on each chart,  be able to view option chain 10, 20, 30,...etc
reviews.author: Adam S

reviews.comment: User friendly.  I would like to have access to binary events and probabilities.
reviews.author: Mike Malm

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Excellent interface

reviews.comment: Great trading platform.
